Description: You hammer down on a target with a peck attack. Make a melee attack roll on a target, doing flying damage on a successful hit. Drill Peck scores a critical hit on 19s and 20s.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 4d6 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
